text: Hilda Sarah Bernard (October 29, 1920 - April 20, 2022) was an Argentine actress. She was born in Puerto Deseado, Argentina. Bernard was known for her roles in Animalada, Chronicle of the Raven, and in Live-in Maid. Her career began in 1941.Hilda Bernard, aged 87, cheerful, bold, transgressive La Nueva newspaper , February 4, 2008 Bernard was married to Horacio Jorge Goncalves and to Horacio Zelada, but both marriages ended in divorce. Bernard had a daughter, Patricia. Bernard turned 100 in October 2020.
